description:
11.42 colorspace_cuda
CUDA accelerated implementation of the colorspace filter.

It is by no means feature complete compared to the software colorspace filter,
and at the current time only supports color range conversion between jpeg/full
and mpeg/limited range.

The filter accepts the following options:
name: colorspace_cuda

parameters.description:
Specify output color range.

The accepted values are:

‘tv’

TV (restricted) range

‘mpeg’

MPEG (restricted) range

‘pc’

PC (full) range

‘jpeg’

JPEG (full) range
parameters.name: range

source:
11.42 colorspace_cuda

CUDA accelerated implementation of the colorspace filter.

It is by no means feature complete compared to the software colorspace filter, and at the current time only supports color range conversion between jpeg/full and mpeg/limited range.

The filter accepts the following options:

range

Specify output color range.

The accepted values are:

‘tv’

TV (restricted) range

‘mpeg’

MPEG (restricted) range

‘pc’

PC (full) range

‘jpeg’

JPEG (full) range
